mapper.select: select * from type where id_type=(select id_parent from type where id_type=#{idType});
select * from type where id_type=(select id_parent from type where name=#{typeName});
select name from type where id_parent = (select id_type from type where name = 'INCOME');
insert into type(name,id_parent) values(#{typeName},(select id_type from type where name = 'INCOME')) returning id_type;
